content.question: The work shown can be identified as belonging to the same artistic tradition as the basin known as the Baptistère de St. Louis because of which of the following visual characteristics?

choices.label: The use of brass inlaid with silver to embellish the surface of the work
The silver gilt worked in filigree to depict a story from classical mythology
The inclusion of radiating designs organized around a central palmette
The calligraphic inscription carved into the surface in low relief

content.answer: The use of brass inlaid with silver to embellish the surface of the work
